subject: Skiing
Drones (Pilotless Planes)
Accidents and Safety
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: F.I.S. banned camera drones after one crashed and nearly hit Hirscher, an Austrian, during a slalom race on Tuesday.
snippet: F.I.S. banned camera drones after one crashed and nearly hit Hirscher, an Austrian, during a slalom race on Tuesday.
